titles.title: To honor Larry Holmes for his career and community service on the 35th anniversary of his winning the WBC World Heavyweight Title.
To honor Larry Holmes for his career and community service on the 35th anniversary of his winning the WBC World Heavyweight Title.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Honors Larry Holmes, on the 35th anniversary of his WBC World Heavyweight Championship victory, for his stellar boxing career and community service.
